Test Description: The function should return 0 when the input string is empty.

Preconditions: Input string contains no numeric values
Test Description: The function should return 0 when the input string contains no numeric values.

Preconditions: Input string contains a single zero
Test Description: The function should return 0 when the input string contains a single zero.

Preconditions: Input string contains any length of numbers separated by a valid delimiter
Test Description: The function should return the sum of two numbers separated by a comma.

Preconditions: Input string contains numbers separated by newline and commas
Test Description: The function should return the sum when numbers are separated by a newline and commas.

Preconditions: Input string contains numbers, with one number or more greater than 1000
Test Description: The function should ignore numbers greater than 1000 and return the sum of the rest.

Preconditions: Input string contains a custom delimiter definition
Test Description: The function should return the sum when a custom delimiter is defined

Preconditions: Input string contains numbers separated by a custom delimiter of any length
Test Description: The function should return the sum when numbers are separated by any length of delimiter.
